ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh.. sorry for being a little vague... Yes I mean the SR robes in Neriak (dark red or something like that). They aren t race specific (HIE, HUM & DARK ELF,
ygData.messageBody:
On 19 Jul, Zinken wrote:
> I think he means the SR aprentice robes you can buy in Neriak,
> but i have to make you disopointed. I think SR robes are race specifik.
> Not sure tho.

Oh.. sorry for being a little vague... Yes I mean the SR robes in
Neriak (dark red or something like that). They aren't race specific
(HIE, HUM & DARK ELF, perhaps some more).

Anyone know how to get one of these, without going into Neriak and Tox.
I have a dark elf enchanter friend if that could help. But the robes
are NO DROP... Can I workaround this with /consent perhaps?

//Shulinar, high elf lv 12 wizard, Rodcet Nife
